title: Chapter 1684 - The Foundations Of The Gods
body:
Chapter 1684 - The Foundations Of The Gods

Su Yi was indeed quite stunned.

The two visions he’d just seen were both utterly astonishing.

One was of a Great Realm expert, Luo Changning, in the Primeval Era. He ignited his Divine Flame and attempted to acquire a divine throne, only for a horde of divine emissaries to join forces against him!

According to Luo Changning, he’d already grasped the secrets of achieving divinity, and all he lacked was the opportunity. Once he found it, he could ignite his divine flame, condense his godhead, and step onto the Path to Divinity.

But the gods would not permit this to happen. They simply expressed their willingness to take Luo Changning as their emissary.

Luo Changning refused and stubbornly attempted to achieve divinity, only to meet with a terrifying tribulation!

Did Luo Changning live or die in the end?

Su Yi didn’t know. What he could say with certainty was that no one had seen Luo Changning since.

He pieced this together from the clues in his second vision. In it, a cataclysm swept heaven and earth, slaughtering the experts at the pinnacle of the Immortal Dao. Heaven and earth crumbled, and blood fell like rain.

The old man in...
original_title: Chapter 1684 - The Foundations of the Gods
